titleStmt.title: A third address directed to his Excellency the Lord Generall Cromwell, and the Right Honourable the Councell of State sitting at White-Hall Being the humble petition of Lieutenant-Colonell John Lilburne prisoner in Newgate.
titleStmt.author: Lilburne, John, 1614?-1657.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Tho. Newcomb dwelling in Thamestreet over against Baynards Castle,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Newgate, this present Monday, being June the 20. 1653.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
